title: The Joys of Technology
author: verias
text:
So, first off, sorry for late page. When trying to get the page queued last night, I kept encountering a Gateway 504 timeout error, and eventually had to sleep.

Anywho, welcome to the finale of this short story. Seems Kietra and Aleena have reached the end of their quest, by finding....Quest! But something's not quite right here...

Hope you guys have enjoyed this installment of Tales of the Arcana, and we'll see you soon with the next installment.

Keith W.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Oh dear, looks like the baleful gaze found Quest and has taken over.

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: You know something's up when a character gets the funny eyes. I hope this is reversible.
